application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for 3 (Materials), 6 (Cycle Parking), 17 (Landscaping), and 19 (Fire Escape) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 of Planning Permission 05/12214/FUL (Erection of "boathouse" building (821m2) over the Barge Dock for use as a restaurant/cafe on first floor with ground floor reception, plant room and alterations to mooring facilities))
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted of the proposed materials in relation to Conditions 3 (Materials) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL to demonstrate that the proposed materials would ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development within the Riverside South Conservation Area in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Due to the insufficient information submitted regarding the proposed boundary treatment, the information submitted in relation to Conditions 17 (Landscaping, Boundary Details and Mooring Fixtures) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL is considered not to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The internal reconfiguration has not been considered as part of this application.

The assessment of this application has been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings. If you carry out development based on incorrect plans you may be liable to the Council taking enforcement action against you.

Inconsistent plans -  please check the proposed floor plans and elevations at the front entrances - is there a side window as shown on the elevations at Ground and First Floors, as the side windows are not shown on the floor plans? Please check and amend where necessary.
Missing Elevation - the proposed East Elevation does not show the garage to the side, when it is shown on the proposed north and south elevations. Please check and amend the plans where necessary.
